message: Let's start fair. You get a good chunk, but I get the lion's share.  Think about it, we can do this the easy way or the hard way.
You're not getting off that easy. I'll give you a decent amount, but don't think you're getting the better deal.

Okay, let's try this again. I'm willing to give you more, but I'm not going to let you take everything.  Let's split it closer to 60/40. We both get a good amount, and we avoid a lot of back and forth.
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not giving up yet. I'll give you a slightly larger share, but don't think you're getting the better deal.
